response.overview: A mysterious man in his 60s kidnaps the son of a powerful businessman, forcing the boy to carry out a series of unsettling tasks under threat of death. As panic sets in, the father uncovers the identity of the kidnapper and the shocking motive behind the abduction. With the help of his nephew, he sets out to confront the man who has turned their lives upside down.
response.title: Kattappa Judgement
